parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description: The domain name of the website that you want to query.

parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description: An array that consists of the IDs of instances to query.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: QueryDomainPattern
parameters.description:
The match mode. Valid values:

*   **fuzzy**: fuzzy match. This is the default value.
*   **exact**: exact match.
